overview: The next generation of off-road adventurers grabs the spotlight in this documentary that takes viewers to the deserts of the American Southwest and Mexico to usher in a new era of desert racing. Rugged conditions, fast cars and the grit and determination of five young men -- Travis Coyne, Gustavo Vildosola Jr., BJ Baldwin, Andy McMillin and Chad Ragland -- elevate off-road racing to a higher level.
title: Bajaflo 2: The New Blood
